hanzi-su-wiki:
漏

Значения

Протекать; просачиваться, вытекать; выявляться, становиться известным; давать просочиться (вытечь); выбалтывать, проговориться

Мнемоника

Дождевая 雨 вода 氵 попадает на сидящего 尸 дома человека в виде протечки.
purpleculture_pinyin:
lòu
to leak; to divulge; to leave out by mistake; waterclock or hourglass (old)
течь; разглашать; исключить по ошибке; водяные часы или песочные часы (старые)
rtega_mnemonic:
漏漏RSleak, drip, funnel, hour glass
  • water 氵 dripping from a body in the rain 屚
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: Water 氵 falling like raindrops 雨; 屚 provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
漏洞 [ lòu dòng ]: leak; hole; gap; loophole
泄漏 [ xiè lòu ]: (of a liquid or gas) to leak; to divulge (a secret); to leak
漏斗 [ lòu dǒu ]: funnel
遗漏 [ yí lòu ]: to overlook; to miss; to omit
漏税 [ lòu shuì ]: tax evasion
purpleculture_tree:

    • 屚 [ lòu ]
heisig_chinese_memo: Water can always leak in the spot left by the flag planted in the roof everytime the rain came. Not too hard to picture a hole left in the ceiling from a flag, now leaking water.
heisig_constituent: leak, water, water droplets, water pistol, flag, rain, weather
koohiiStory1: WATER always LEAKED in the spot left by the FLAG planted in the roof everytime it RAINED. Not too hard to picture a hole left in the ceiling from a flag, now leaking water.
koohiiStory2: Mark the holes where rain water can leak through with little flags.
jp_example_words:
漏らす(もらす): to let leak, to reveal
漏る(もる): to leak, to run out
漏れる(もれる): to leak out, to escape, to come through, to shine through, to filter out, to be omitted
jp_readingExamples: 漏らす (も.らす), 漏る (も.る), 漏れる (も.れる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A tsunami rips a flag off your house in the rain, causing a leak where it was ripped out. The rain and the tsunami combined just tore the flag right off your house. The force was so strong that it actually removed part of the wall, and now you have a leak in your home.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look at this leak in your house and see the rain water coming in. Hear it drip drip dripping down the wall.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The leak is getting worse and worse and so is the tsunami, when you see something outside. It’s a bunch of roe (ろう) floating in the waves. Using your quick thinking skills you scoop it up and shove it into the cracks where the water is leaking in. It works like a charm!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Did you know that roe can plug any leak? It’s true. If you don’t mind wasting some, you should break a leak into your own house and then try to plug it back up again with some salmon roe.
Ru_trainchinese: lòu: (глаг) протекать; разглашать, выдавать (тайну); пропускать (напр., слово)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the rain (雨) and water (氵) from the corpse (尸) are leaking
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Water can always leak in the spot left by the flag planted in the roof everytime the rain came. Not too hard to picture a hole left in the ceiling from a flag, now leaking water.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " water " and "屚", the original meaning is the ancient timer clepsydra. "Shuwen": "Use copper to receive the water carving festival, day and night. From the water, the sound of the sound." "Historical Records-Sima Rongju Biography": "Rangju first galloped to the army, standing under the watch and waiting for Jia."

" Leak " can mean the change and time. "Han Shu·Dong Xian Biography": "Over two years old, Xian Chuan leaked in His Highness." Yan Shi Gu's note: "Pass the leak, play the moment."

" Leak " also means that liquid, gas, light, etc. seep or leak out of the pores. "Yi‧Jing": "The well valley shoots crucian carp, and the urn leaks." Kong Yingdashu: "There is a leak like an urn, and the water leaks down, so it is called the urn leak."

" Leaking " also means drying up and draining. "Xunzi ‧ Wang Zhi": "The basket is rich, the treasury is already available, but the people are poor, the husband is said to be overflowing and leaking." Wang Xianqian quoted Wang Yinzhi: "Overflow, fullness, omission Yeah."

" Leak " also refers to omission. Han Ban Gu's "History Shuzan‧ Shu Gaoji": "Real innate virtue, smart and martial. The Qin people do not have the key, the net leaks to the Chu."

" Leak " also means leak. "Han Feizi·Foreign Reserve Says Upper Right": "Today I am the owner of the people and miss the words of his officials. It is a jade that is still unworthy."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " water " and "屚", the original meaning is the ancient clepsydra.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「屚」聲，本義為古代計時器漏壺。《說文》：「以銅受水刻節，晝夜百刻。从水，屚聲。」《史記‧司馬穰苴列傳》：「穰苴先馳至軍，立表下漏待賈。」

　　「漏」可表示更次、時刻。《漢書‧董賢傳》：「二歲餘，賢傳漏在殿下。」顏師古注：「傳漏，奏時刻。」

　　「漏」還表示液體、氣體、光線等從孔隙中滲出或透出。《易‧井》：「井谷射鮒，甕敝漏。」孔穎達疏：「有似甕敝漏水，水漏下流，故曰甕敝漏也。」

　　「漏」亦表示乾涸、流失。《荀子‧王制》：「筐篋已富，府庫已實，而百姓貧，夫是之謂上溢而下漏。」王先謙集解引王引之曰：「溢，滿也，漏之言漉也。」

　　「漏」也指疏漏。漢班固《史述贊‧述高紀》：「實天生德，聰明神武。秦人不綱，網漏於楚。」

　　「漏」還表示泄露。《韓非子‧外儲說右上》：「今為人主而漏其群臣之語，是猶無當之玉卮也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「屚」聲，本義為古代計時器漏壺。

Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: Water 氵 falling like raindrops 雨; 屚 provides the pronunciation
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 屚 [ lòu ]
①物体由孔或缝透过：壶里的水漏光了。漏风。渗漏。漏泄(ａ．水、光等流出或透出；b．泄露)。漏电(跑电)。
②泄露：走漏消息。漏底(泄露内情)。透漏。
③脱逃或无意放过：疏漏。遗漏。挂一漏万。漏网之鱼。
④(漏壶)古代计时器，铜制有孔，可以滴水或漏沙，有刻度标志以计时间。简称“漏”，如“铜壶滴漏”(亦称“铜壶刻漏”)，“漏尽更深”。
⑤中医指某些流出脓血黏液的病：崩漏(子宫大量出血的病)。痔漏。
漏洞 [ lòu dòng ]: leak; hole; gap; loophole
漏斗 [ lòu dǒu ]: funnel
漏税 [ lòu shuì ]: tax evasion

從「 水 」，「 屚 」聲，本義為古代計時器漏壺。《說文》：「以銅受水刻節，晝夜百刻。从水，屚聲。」《史記‧司馬穰苴列傳》：「穰苴先馳至軍，立表下漏待賈。」 「 漏 」可表示更次、時刻。《漢書‧董賢傳》：「二歲餘，賢傳漏在殿下。」顏師古注：「傳漏，奏時刻。」 「 漏 」還表示液體、氣體、光線等從孔隙中滲出或透出。《易‧井》：「井谷射鮒，甕敝漏。」孔穎達疏：「有似甕敝漏水，水漏下流，故曰甕敝漏也。」 「 漏 」亦表示乾涸、流失。《荀子‧王制》：「筐篋已富，府庫已實，而百姓貧，夫是之謂上溢而下漏。」王先謙集解引王引之曰：「溢，滿也，漏之言漉也。」 「 漏 」也指疏漏。漢班固《史述贊‧述高紀》：「實天生德，聰明神武。秦人不綱，網漏於楚。」 「 漏 」還表示泄露。《韓非子‧外儲說右上》：「今為人主而漏其群臣之語，是猶無當之玉卮也。」
From the sound of " water" and " 屚", the original meaning is the ancient timer clepsydra. "Shuwen": "Use copper to receive the water carving festival, day and night. From the water, the sound of the sound." "Historical Records-Sima Rongju Biography": "Rangju first galloped to the army, standing under the watch and waiting for Jia." " Leak" can mean the change and time. "Han Shu·Dong Xian Biography": "Over two years old, Xian Chuan leaked in His Highness." Yan Shi Gu's note: "Pass the leak, play the moment." " Leak" also means that liquid, gas, light, etc. seep or leak out of the pores. "Yi‧Jing": "The well valley shoots crucian carp, and the urn leaks." Kong Yingdashu: "There is a leak like an urn, and the water leaks down, so it is called the urn leak." " Leaking" also means drying up and draining. "Xunzi ‧ Wang Zhi": "The basket is rich, the treasury is already available, but the people are poor, the husband is said to be overflowing and leaking." Wang Xianqian quoted Wang Yinzhi: "Overflow, fullness, omission Yeah." " Leak" also refers to omission. Han Ban Gu's "History Shuzan‧ Shu Gaoji": "Real innate virtue, smart and martial. The Qin people do not have the key, the net leaks to the Chu." " Leak" also means leak. "Han Feizi·Foreign Reserve Says Upper Right": "Today I am the owner of the people and miss the words of his officials. It is a jade that is still unworthy."

漏字的基本解释

漏
lòu
物体由孔或缝透过：壶里的水漏光了。漏风。渗漏。漏泄（ａ．水、光等流出或透出；ｂ．泄露）。漏电（跑电）。
泄露：走漏消息。漏底（泄露内情）。透漏。
脱逃或无意放过：疏漏。遗漏。挂一漏万。漏网之鱼。
〔漏壶〕古代计时器，铜制有孔，可以滴水或漏沙，有刻度标志以计时间。简称“漏”，如“铜壶滴漏”（亦称“铜壶刻漏”），“漏尽更深”。
中医指某些流出脓血黏液的病：崩漏（子宫大量出血的病）。痔漏。

漏字的汉语字典释义
漏字的康熙字典解释
漏字的源字形
漏字的起名意思

本意指漏壶的简称，有漏下的意思，也有时间，时刻之义。

leak
Basic explanation of words
leak
lòu
The object penetrates through a hole or slit: the water in the pot leaks. Air leak. leakage. Leakage (a. Water, light, etc. flow out or leak out; b. Leakage). Leakage (power running).
Leak: Leaking news. Leak the bottom (leak the inside story). disclose.
Escape or accidentally let it go: omission. Omission. Hang one out of ten thousand. The fish that slipped through the net.
〔Clepskins〕An ancient timer, made of copper with holes, can drip water or leak sand, and have scale marks to count time. Abbreviated as "leak", such as "bronze pot drip" (also known as "copper pot engraved leak"), "drain deeper."
Traditional Chinese medicine refers to certain diseases that discharge pus, blood, and mucus: metrorrhagia (a disease of massive uterine bleeding). Hemorrhoids.
leak
Chinese dictionary definition of words
leak
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
leak
Source glyph
leak
Name meaning
The original meaning is the abbreviation of clepsydra, which has the meaning of leaking, but also the meaning of time and moment.
lòu
I
гл. А
1) протекать; пропускать воду; давать течь; прохудившийся, худой
房子漏了 помещение протекает
漏屋子不能住 в протекающей комнате жить нельзя
奉漏瓮沃焦釜 из прохудившейся корчаги заливать раскалённый котёл (обр. в знач.: дело не терпит промедления, необходимо действовать быстро)
2) просачиваться, проникать; пробиваться, проходить внутрь (изнутри)
日光穿漏了 солнечные лучи пробились, солнечный свет проникает снаружи
3) просачиваться наружу, получать широкую огласку; становиться известным
计漏 план стал известен, заговор получил огласку
4) схлынуть, спасть, сойти (о воде); утечь; истощаться (напр. о средствах)
鸿水漏, 九州干 большая вода потопа сошла, и девять островов-областей стали сушей
钱财漏了 денежные средства утекли (иссякли)
5) исчезать из памяти, забываться; быть забытым (пропущенным, напр. в списках); забытый, незарегистрированный, пропущенный в списках
名漏不传 (chuán) имя (напр. автора) было забыто и до нас не дошло
漏户 дворы не занесены в списки налогоплательщиков
гл. Б
1) пропускать; давать утечку (чего-л.)
漏气 пропускать воздух
漏水 давать утечку воды. протекать
漏雨 сыпать дождём (о небе, туче)
2) проникать внутрь (чего-л.), заливать (особенно; сверху); переполнять
淫雨漏河 затяжные дожди вызвали разлив Реки (Хуанхэ)
3) разгласить секрет (кого-л.); раскрыть, выдать (напр. чью-л. тайну)
漏了风声 проговориться, предать огласке (секрет)
漏师 разгласить военный секрет
4) вовлекать, увлекать, соблазнять, заманивать (обычно: обманом)
漏他来赶 подговорить его поторопиться
漏人 завлекать (обманывать) людей
5) пропустить, не заметить, упустить нечаянно; не внести (напр. в текст); нарочно уйти от (напр. налога)
这一行 (háng) 漏了两个字 на этой строке пропущено два иероглифа
漏球 спорт пропустить мяч
挂一漏万 ухватиться за одно и упустить всё остальное; далеко не полный
II сущ.
1) клепсидра, водяные часы (также обр. в знач.: часы, время); время
漏声 звук падающих капель в водяных часах
沙漏 песочные часы
传 (chuán) 漏 докладывать время (по клепсидре)
2) будд. (санскр. āsrava): a) проникающее через органы чувств отравляющее влияние внешнего мира; б) утрата истинного учения под влиянием соблазнов внешнего мира
3) * отверстие, пустота
禹耳三漏 миф. уши Юя имели по 3 отверстия (хода)
4) кит. мед. вм. 瘘 (свищ, фистула)
5) кит. мед. истечение, выделение (напр. при геморрое); слизь
6) северо-западный (самый сокровенный, укромный) угол (дома)
尚不愧于屋漏 нет причин стыдиться даже наедине с самим собой; совесть совершенно чиста
IV собств.
Лоу (фамилия)
Radicals: 氵, 尸, 雨  (tsunami, flag, rain)
Meaning Mnemonic
A tsunami rips a flag off your house in the rain, causing a leak where it was ripped out. The rain and the tsunami combined just tore the flag right off your house. The force was so strong that it actually removed part of the wall, and now you have a leak in your home.
Look at this leak in your house and see the rain water coming in. Hear it drip drip dripping down the wall.
Reading Mnemonic
The leak is getting worse and worse and so is the tsunami, when you see something outside. It’s a bunch of roe (ろう) floating in the waves. Using your quick thinking skills you scoop it up and shove it into the cracks where the water is leaking in. It works like a charm!
Did you know that roe can plug any leak? It’s true. If you don’t mind wasting some, you should break a leak into your own house and then try to plug it back up again with some salmon roe.

Examples: 漏らす (も.らす), 漏る (も.る), 漏れる (も.れる)
尸 (труп), 汁 (суп), 雨 (дождь)
